WorkItem.Description:
Take a look at the following RSVs for my blood DK tank:
 
Name,Equipped,Slot,Gem1,Gem2,Gem3,Enchant,Source,ItemId,GemmedId,Overall,Survival,Mitigation,Threat
 Agility,False,,,,,,,,,64.73071,24.028,28.79136,11.91134
 Dodge Rating,False,,,,,,,,,44.67706,0,44.67706,0
 Parry Rating,False,,,,,,,,,36.46437,0,36.46437,0
 Strength,False,,,,,,,,,27.50666,0,10.08988,17.41678
 Armor,False,,,,,,,,,24.75541,20.64906,4.106348,0
 Armor Penetration Rating,False,,,,,,,,,17.85968,0,0.2581133,17.60157
 Crit Rating,False,,,,,,,,,17.57224,0,0.2581133,17.31412
 Melee Crit,False,,,,,,,,,17.57224,0,0.2581133,17.31412
 Expertise Rating,False,,,,,,,,,17.48131,0,17.48131,0
 Health,False,,,,,,,,,15.59826,14.68899,0.8681992,0.04106348
 Bonus Armor,False,,,,,,,,,14.38395,12.014,2.369949,0
 Hit Rating,False,,,,,,,,,10.97568,0,0.3519726,10.62371
 Haste Rating,False,,,,,,,,,10.17788,0,0.1173242,10.06055
 Attack Power,False,,,,,,,,,8.180431,0,0.1173242,8.063107
 Stamina,False,,,,,,,,,1,3.84,-2.88,0.04
 
Note how highly health is rated while stamina is rated very low (with a negative mitigation component to boot).  Since stam is convertible to health and nothing else, this would seem to be a bug.

Comments.Message: This is a known issue MoB and/or Vampiric Blood.  (I can't remember at this point.)  The health/healing provided by one of these talents sends the RSV haywire.  All the other values for stat/talent weighting is correct, but yes, RSVs get all screwy.  This was the current compromise that I had to settle for to get these talents back implemented.
Cool.  Just reporting it so ya know.

Did some more playing around, and it seems like a number of different things seem to trigger it.
It used to be either MoB or VB, but today I'm seeing it in RuneTap and/or Improved RuneTap.
